page.title: 16HOUSING IN ARDBOE
page.content: After farming and fishing the other main occupations are connected with the building industry;plastering,plumbing,joinery , bricklayingand so on.We have a number offactories scattered about in the business of making furniture, processing fish,manufacturing concrete products.With so many people in the building business ,a lot of them have built their own homes.Indeed the majority of the population own or are buying their houses.These houses mostly bungalow types,are spread out over the whole area and would make up a fair sized town if gathered together.There are several small housing estatesowned by the NORTHERN IRELAND HOUSING EXECUTIVE,built within the last 15 to20 years.Very few of the old farmhouse or cottage types are left.
